languages.text: Ваши люди совершенно не готовы к прыжку — даже тщательно подготовленное перемещение в Имматериум чревато последствиями, а сейчас у вас не хватает времени и на краткий молебен. Несмотря на самоубийственный приказ, ваши офицеры безропотно принимаются отдавать команды, а Санктум Навис полнится воплями тех, кто не успел покинуть навигаторские покои прежде, чем начнется перелет. Яркая вспышка, тошнота, привычная тяжесть — и вот мерзкие пираты остаются позади.

traits.locale_text: Ваши люди совершенно не готовы к прыжку — даже тщательно подготовленое перемещение в Имматериум чревато последствиями, а сейчас у вас не хватает времени даже на краткий молебен. Несмотря на самоубийственный приказ, ваши офицеры безропотно принимаются отдавать команды, а Санктум Навис полнится воплями тех, кто не успел покинуть навигаторские покои прежде, чем начнется перелет. Яркая вспышка, тошнота, привычная тяжесть — и вот мерзкие пираты остаются позади.

languages.text: Your crew is completely unprepared for the jump. Even a carefully planned shift into the Immaterium is fraught with consequences, and right now you do not even have time for a short prayer service. Your officers do not question the suicidal orders they have just received and set about issuing commands, while the Sanctum Navis is filled with the screams of those who were not quick enough to leave the Navigator's chambers before the start of the flight. A bright flash, nausea, the familiar heaviness — and the loathsome pirates are now behind you.

Яркая вспышка, тошнота, привычная тяжесть — и вот мерзкие пираты остаются позади.

traits.locale_text: Your crew is completely unprepared for the jump. Even a carefully planned entrance into the Immaterium is fraught with consequences, and right now you don't even have time for a short prayer service. Your officers don't question the suicidal orders they've just received, and set about issuing commands, while the Sanctum Navis is filled with the screams of those who didn't have time to leave the Navigator's chambers before the start of the flight. A bright flash, nausea, the familiar heaviness — and the loathsome pirates are now behind you.

Your crew is completely unprepared for the jump. Even a carefully planned shift into the Immaterium is fraught with consequences, and right now you do not even have time for a short prayer service. Your officers do not question the suicidal orders they have just received and set about issuing commands, while the Sanctum Navis is filled with the screams of those who were not quick enough to leave the Navigator's chambers before the start of the flight. A bright flash, nausea, the familiar heaviness — and the loathsome pirates are now behind you.

languages.text: 你的船员完全没有做好亚空间跳跃的准备。哪怕是精心准备的亚空间跳跃，也可能会充满了意外，而你现在甚至都没有时间进行简短的祈祷仪式。你的军官们并没有质疑这个自杀性的决定，忠实地传达了你的命令。导航者圣所随即传来了阵阵尖叫，这些声音都是那些没能赶在亚空间跳跃之前离开圣所的人发出的惨叫。一道亮光闪过，伴随着恶心与熟悉的沉重感，那些令人生厌的海盗已经被你甩在了身后。
languages.original_text: Your crew is completely unprepared for the jump. Even a carefully planned shift into the Immaterium is fraught with consequences, and right now you do not even have time for a short prayer service. Your officers do not question the suicidal orders they have just received and set about issuing commands, while the Sanctum Navis is filled with the screams of those who were not quick enough to leave the Navigator's chambers before the start of the flight. A bright flash, nausea, the familiar heaviness — and the loathsome pirates are now behind you.

traits.locale_text: 你的船员完全没有做好亚空间跳跃的准备。哪怕是精心准备的亚空间跳跃，也可能会充满了意外，而你现在甚至都没有时间进行简短的祈祷仪式。你的军官们并没有质疑这个自杀性的决定，忠实地传达了你的命令。导航者圣所随即传来了阵阵尖叫，这些声音都是那些没能赶在亚空间跳跃之前离开圣所的人发出的惨叫。一道亮光闪过，伴随着恶心与熟悉的沉重感，那些令人生厌的海盗已经被你甩在了身后。

languages.text: Tu tripulación no estaba preparada para el salto. Incluso una transición cuidadosamente planificada al Inmaterio está llena de peligros, y ahora mismo no puedes permitirte ni unas breves plegarias. Tus oficiales no cuestionan las órdenes suicidas que acabas de dar y empiezan a ejecutarlas mientras el Sanctum Navis se llena de los gritos de quienes no han logrado salir de los aposentos de tu Navegante antes de que empezara el viaje. Un gran destello, náuseas y la familiar pesadez... y los odiosos piratas quedan atrás.
languages.original_text: Your crew is completely unprepared for the jump. Even a carefully planned shift into the Immaterium is fraught with consequences, and right now you do not even have time for a short prayer service. Your officers do not question the suicidal orders they have just received and set about issuing commands, while the Sanctum Navis is filled with the screams of those who were not quick enough to leave the Navigator's chambers before the start of the flight. A bright flash, nausea, the familiar heaviness — and the loathsome pirates are now behind you.

traits.locale_text: Tu tripulación no estaba preparada para el salto. Incluso una transición cuidadosamente planificada al Inmaterio está llena de peligros, y ahora mismo no puedes permitirte ni unas breves plegarias. Tus oficiales no cuestionan las órdenes suicidas que acabas de dar y empiezan a ejecutarlas mientras el Sanctum Navis se llena de los gritos de quienes no han logrado salir de los aposentos de tu Navegante antes de que empezara el viaje. Un gran destello, náuseas y la familiar pesadez... y los odiosos piratas quedan atrás.

languages.text: クルーは飛び立つ準備がまったくできていなかった。非物質世界への移動は慎重に計画されたものでも結果を伴うが、今は短い祈りの儀式をする時間さえない。士官は今しがた受けた自殺行為のような命令について尋ねようとはせず、それを遂行しようとする。そしてサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスは、飛行開始前に航宙士の部屋を出られなかった者たちの悲鳴で溢れていた。 目のくらむような閃光、吐き気、いつもの重苦しさ。そして、いまわしい海賊が今、背後にいる。
languages.original_text: Your crew is completely unprepared for the jump. Even a carefully planned shift into the Immaterium is fraught with consequences, and right now you do not even have time for a short prayer service. Your officers do not question the suicidal orders they have just received and set about issuing commands, while the Sanctum Navis is filled with the screams of those who were not quick enough to leave the Navigator's chambers before the start of the flight. A bright flash, nausea, the familiar heaviness — and the loathsome pirates are now behind you.

traits.locale_text: クルーは飛び立つ準備がまったくできていなかった。非物質世界への移動は慎重に計画されたものでも結果を伴うが、今は短い祈りの儀式をする時間さえない。士官は今しがた受けた自殺行為のような命令について尋ねようとはせず、それを遂行しようとする。そしてサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスは、飛行開始前に航宙士（ナヴィゲイター）の部屋を出られなかった者たちの悲鳴で溢れていた。 目のくらむような閃光、吐き気、いつもの重苦しさ。そして、いまわしい海賊が今、背後にいる。

languages.text: Deine Crew ist auf den Sprung überhaupt kein bisschen vorbereitet. Selbst ein sorgfältig geplanter Übergang ins Immaterium birgt größte Gefahren, und im Augenblick habt ihr nicht einmal Zeit für ein kurzes Gebet. Deine Offiziere hinterfragen die selbstmörderischen Befehle nicht, die sie gerade erhalten haben, sondern machen sich sofort an deren Umsetzung. Aus dem Sanctum Navis ertönen derweil die Schreie derer, die vor dem Start des Flugs nicht mehr rechtzeitig die Kammern der Navigatorin verlassen haben. Ein heller Blitz, Übelkeit, die vertraute Schwere ... und die schändlichen Piraten liegen jetzt hinter euch.
languages.original_text: Your crew is completely unprepared for the jump. Even a carefully planned shift into the Immaterium is fraught with consequences, and right now you do not even have time for a short prayer service. Your officers do not question the suicidal orders they have just received and set about issuing commands, while the Sanctum Navis is filled with the screams of those who were not quick enough to leave the Navigator's chambers before the start of the flight. Deine Offiziere hinterfragen die selbstmörderischen Befehle nicht, die sie gerade erhalten haben, sondern machen sich sofort an deren Umsetzung. Ein heller Blitz, Übelkeit, die vertraute Schwere ... und die schändlichen Piraten liegen jetzt hinter euch.

languages.text: Votre équipage est pas du tout prêt pour ce saut. Même un passage minutieusement planifié dans l'Immaterium est lourd de conséquences, et dans l'immédiat, vous n'avez même pas le temps pour une courte cérémonie de prière. Vos officiers ne remettent pas en doute les ordres suicidaires qu'ils viennent de recevoir et se préparent à les exécuter, tandis que le sanctum navis se remplit des cris de ceux qui n'ont pas été capables de quitter les quartiers du navigateur avant le début du vol. Un flash intense, de la nausée, cette lourdeur habituelle... et vous laissez ces infâmes pirates derrière vous.

Your officers do not question the suicidal orders they have just received and set about issuing commands, while the Sanctum Navis is filled with the screams of those who were not quick enough to leave the Navigator's chambers before the start of the flight. A bright flash, nausea, the familiar heaviness — and the loathsome pirates are now behind you.

languages.text: Mürettebatın sıçramaya hazırlık yapacak vakti bulamıyor. Hatta Tindiyar'a dikkatlice planlanmış bir geçiş bile risklerle dolu, üstelik şu anda kısa bir ayine bile vakit yok. Subayların, az önce aldıkları intihar niteliğindeki emirleri sorgulamadan komutları iletmeye başlıyor. Bu sırada Navis Kutağı, uçuş başlamadan önce Rotacı'nın odasından yeterince hızlı çıkamayanların çığlıklarıyla dolup taşıyor. Bir parıltı, mide bulantısı, tanıdık ağırlık hissi meydana geliyor. İğrenç korsanlar geride kalıyor.
languages.original_text: Your crew is completely unprepared for the jump. Your officers do not question the suicidal orders they have just received and set about issuing commands, while the Sanctum Navis is filled with the screams of those who were not quick enough to leave the Navigator's chambers before the start of the flight.
